entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
